name: Nowhere (Miguel López, Diego Díaz, Franc Martell, FrankieBu, ClaraBMtnez)
name_original: Nowhere (Miguel López, Diego Díaz, Franc Martell, FrankieBu, ClaraBMtnez)
description:
CREDITS

Game Design: Franc Martell & Diego Díaz
Programming: Miguel López & Diego Díaz
2D Art: Frank Ruocco & Clara B. Martínez

A game for Telefónica Talentum Jam developed in less than 48 hours (it was a 4 days jam, but we have other events, sicks, jobs and other inconveniencies xD).

You are an old glory retired in your familiar farm of Nowhere. One day, you receive the surprising visit of your monsters of the past. Protect your farm from  the evil, but... you only can defend to one cardinal quadrant at the same time!

CHANGELOG

v. 2
• Bug fixed: Game Over screen didn't work right.
• Bug fixed: When you passed turn with a weapon selected, board keep resized.
• Bug fixed: When more than three monsters met in the same sector, last one appeared in base
• Now, when you shot a weapon, it gets unselected.
• Buttons visual feedback improved.
• Balanced.
• Localized to English.
• Android version added!

v. 1
Telefónica Talentum Jam Jam original version.

AWARDS

2º Best Game of Telefónica Talentum Jam Jam.
